text: Ek aisa theme chunen jo aapke brand se match kare aur aasani se use ho.  Clear navigation aur attractive visuals zaruri hain.
Blurry ya low-resolution images se bachne ki koshish karen. Professional aur engaging photos use karen jo aapke products ko highlight karen.
Aapki website pe navigation easy aur intuitive hona chahiye. Customers ko aasani se woh products mil jaye jin ki unko talash hai.

step_heading: Clear Call to Action Use Karein
text: Customers ko bataye ke aap unse kya karna chahte hain.  'Shop Now', 'Learn More', ya 'Contact Us' jaise clear calls to action use karen.
